item.title: "New on New"
item.author: peter.borocz@gmail.com (Péter Böröcz)
item.description: What is it? When combining more than one new resource with another one. Resources could be almost anything, i.e. people, technology, processes etc. What are some examples? Pairing a brand new technology stack on a brand-new project (particularly without adequate risk-management). Pairing a newly-hired employee under a newly-hired supervisor/manager. Pairing a brand new project manager onto a new, high-risk project. Suggestions? As a risk manager, I always suggest never getting into the New on New scenario.
